item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, September 10, 2024 at 4:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Radiology specific foundation model released by Harrison.ai (43 points | 1 comment)
2. An NFC Movie Library for My Kids (325 points | 59 comments)
3. Just for Fun. No (15 points | 2 comments)
4. Affordable DE10-Nano compatible boards for MiSTer FPGA retro platform (45 points | 5 comments)
5. Windows NT vs. Unix: A design comparison (334 points | 255 comments)
6. iPhone 16 Pro and iPhone 16 Pro Max (433 points | 1113 comments)
7. DOJ claims Google has "trifecta of monopolies" on Day 1 of ad tech trial (126 points | 58 comments)
8. Synthetic diamonds are now purer, more beautiful, and cheaper than mined (505 points | 308 comments)
9. Carpentopod: A Walking Table Project (102 points | 12 comments)
10. Project Hammer: reduce collusion in the Canadian grocery sector (262 points | 177 comments)
11. Launch HN: Deepsilicon (YC S24) – Software and hardware for ternary transformers (146 points | 54 comments)
12. Sigrok – a portable, cross-platform, FOSS signal analysis software suite (46 points | discuss)
13. Sqlc: Compile SQL to type-safe code (86 points | 39 comments)
14. API Complexity Is a Lie (7 points | 2 comments)
15. Transfusion: Predict the next token and diffuse images with one multimodal model (76 points | 5 comments)
16. Talaria: Interactively Optimizing Machine Learning Models for Efficient Inferenc (18 points | discuss)
17. Cecilia Payne-Gaposchkin discovered that stars are mostly made of hydrogen (46 points | 10 comments)
18. B-Trees and Database Indexes (170 points | 30 comments)
19. Gdi.js: JavaScript Runtime Written in Object Pascal (11 points | discuss)
20. Litecli: CLI for SQLite Databases with auto-completion and syntax highlighting (51 points | 6 comments)
21. PSA: Eget That Executable from GitHub (29 points | 12 comments)
22. Why GitHub won (418 points | 366 comments)
23. Hacking misconfigured AWS S3 buckets: A complete guide (168 points | 34 comments)
24. Every webpage deserves to be a place (76 points | 21 comments)
25. FTC Pushed to Crack Down on Companies That Ruin Hardware via Software Updates (285 points | 108 comments)
26. MNT Reform Next (127 points | 44 comments)
27. James Earl Jones has died (525 points | 144 comments)
28. Show HN: I mapped HN's favorite books with GPT-4o (210 points | 47 comments)
29. Apple Watch Series 10 (170 points | 354 comments)
30. 300μs typo detection for 1.3M words (67 points | 11 comments)
